thread.title: James Harden surprised a fan with an autographed game ball on her 100th birthday
thread.title_full: James Harden surprised a fan with an autographed game ball on her 100th birthday - Business Insider

author: Associated Press
title: James Harden surprised a fan with an autographed game ball on her 100th birthday
text:
Instagram/NBA
HOUSTON (AP) â James Harden took some time out after the Houston Rockets' win over the visiting Milwaukee Bucks to give a fan a present on a her 100th birthday.
Video shows Harden signing a ball for the woman and spending a few moments sitting next to her in her courtside seat and posing for pictures Wednesday night (see video below).
Harden told ESPN's Doris Burke in an interview that he told the woman how "blessed" he was to be able to have a chance to meet her.
@jharden13 helps a fan celebrate her đŻth birthday! đ #ThisIsWhyWePlay
A video posted by NBA (@nba) on Jan 18, 2017 at 7:30pm PSTÂ on Jan 18, 2017 at 7:30pm PST
The Houston guard also put on a good show for the fan during the game, scoring 38 points in a 111-92 victory over the Bucks.
